alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1031 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Bayard, or near Fruit Cove, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin and Guana River State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
